name: I love computers
description: Computers are the best thing in the world. They allow me to do so much. When connected to the internet, I can message my friends, see the news and even write in blogs like this. This is awesome!!

name: Why my PC broke
description: I was trying to overclock it to the max and I thought I had it running great. This was going to be my mining rig. Unfortunately, the heat was too much and my 6 graphics cards caused a small fire. I have lost everything.

name: A new beginning
description: After cashing in the insurance check, I have decided to take it easy for a while. I am going to start slow and then begin building small. Instead of going 1-100. This will serve me well in the future.
